phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
During the initial confrontations with Phantom Lord,
In order for us to stop the Magic Giant,
we have to defeat the Element 4.
And by the way, Lucy, who is being targeted by Phantom,
was hidden away in the safe-house, but...
I have got a bad feeling about this.
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
The Magic Giant's writing speed has slowed down considerably, right?
A Magic Giant that moves using the power of the four elements.
And the source of that magical power is the Element 4.
Totomaru of the Conflagration, who was guarding Jupiter.
Sol of the Land, who Elfman defeated.
And there is Juvia of the Deep, who Gray defeated.
Then that means there is only one left.
If we can defeat that fourth member, we can stop the giant.
Which means we can stop them from casting Abyss Break.
The final one, Aria of the Heavens.
The strongest wizard of the Element 4.
And he is the one who took the master's magical power!
You hold up quite well, Salamander.
I am all fired up, you bastard!
So this is the strongest man in the Element 4!
There is always someone better, young dragon...
Let me give you the same suffering I gave to Makarov...
No matter the wizard, inside this airspace their magical power will empty!
Hey, is it okay for you to move with that injury?
He is the one who did that to the master?
For me to have the head of not only Salamander, but Titania as well!
So you are the bastard who laid hands on him.
He is like a father to us!
Since I get to actually face Erza...
Aria usually has his eyes closed.
By closing his eyes he suppresses the overwhelming magical power he possesses, it seems.
Anyway, if you find Aria, beat him before he can open his eyes!
If he opens them, you might lose any chance at victory.
Is this as far as we go?
Activate the Airspace of Death, Zero!
This Airspace will consume all life within it!
This is not good at all!
How can you take people's lives so easily?
She is slicing through the Airspace?!
She beat him in one hit!
Erza's dangerous, that is for sure!
The likes of you should never have been able to beat the master.
Your days of glory will be wiped out, starting now.
The power of the four elements has been cut off.
I knew they could do it.
Hey there, Double Stuf, it is about time you gave up and handed that girl over.
Our master is waiting, you see.
It is for everyone is sake!
Oh, you are makin' me cry.
I have seen them on Mt. Hakobe.
Any hostility is reflected by these mirrors.
Leaving your ally and running away, Princess?
You Fairy Butts are not so hot after all.
If they would let somebody like you join!
You actually like hanging out with these guys, Princess?
Now that is what I call a greeting!
What have you done to Lucy?
I will erase you from this world!
I have been looking to have some fun.
What is with the strange vibes I am getting from him?
He is not just some Holder-type wizard, is he?
I would rather not be sniffed by guys.
Bozu, Sue, I am heading back.
It is impossible for you to escape from there for a while.
Have a good look at your own pitiful form.
Those Element 4 were wiped out fighting that worthless Fairy Tail?
If you are beat by trash, then you are trash yourself.
I have brought a present, Master.
But you did an excellent job finding her, Gajeel.
Do not underestimate the nose of a Dragon Slayer.
You are sure she is still alive?
This is all pointless if she is not.
I did rough her up a lot.
Looks like she is still kickin'!
Attention all you from Fairy Tail.
Please listen carefully to this voice.
So, we have accomplished one of our objectives.
Thus we have one final goal that remains to be fulfilled.
Wiping you off the face of this earth!
I was not able to protect you...
I knew something bad would happen...
Why did not I come earlier?
Lucy, scared to be close to you!
I think the number of Shades has increased!
There are a number of bugs still in my guild building.
I will show them there will not be any more miracles...
I will clean them up myself!
You have... power... sleeping within you...
You are the one who will surpass me!
And you think I will listen to you?
Considering your age, do not you think it is a bit early for you to have recovered?
The age crack was not necessary.
I am going to do my duty as a parent.
Looks like there were some fireworks here too.
You should not even be standing!
You actually fought with wounds like that?
I never wanted you to see me so weak like this...
I guess I still have a long way to go.
It sends chills down a Man's spine!
I am quite impressed, my Fairy Tail Wizards...
To think I would be able to have such fun...
I never would have dreamed it.
Destroying Jupiter, taking down the Element 4...
And even bringing my Magic Giant to its knees!
I feel nauseous just standing near him!
Now, I must thank you for the fun you have given me.
I am pretty sure you took a direct hit from Jupiter.
How is it you can stand?
It will be such a pleasure to destroy you, girl!
But man, what a lame reaction...
Gajeel, do not you think you should stop now?
You keep doing this, and it will be serious trouble!
Making me watch over the girl like this,
and going to deal with the flies himself.
What is the harm in doing this to pass the time, huh?
If the master finds out, he will not let you off so easy!
Maybe she is some noblewoman or something, but to me she is nothing but Fairy Butt trash.
And even if she is a woman, she is still a Wizard.
She should be prepared for this when she joined a guild.
Master's going to be pissed, big time.
If that happens, I will blame it on you guys.
Now that they know she is rich, the Fairy Butts are frantic to get her back.
You guys really are complete idiots.
I think I am tearing up.
I am not scared of you at all!
You have got some balls bluffing in a situation like this.
I must say that is not bad...
What I want to hear is not your backtalk.
I want to hear you scream.
You do not start yelling and there is going to be trouble.
Then why do not you try killing me?
You do that, and you will be in bigger trouble.
Fairy Tail would never forgive you.
That is the kind of guild they are!
You would be shivering under the shadow of the world's scariest guild every day...
For the rest of your lives!
So that means he eats iron, right?
Just like you eat fire, Natsu, he should eat his element.
Then could not you become the Fish Dragon Slayer, Happy?
That might be kind of cool!
Next time: The Two Dragon Slayers!
What would the Roar of the Fish Dragon be like?
You would shoot fish or something from your mouth...
